long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tiny Fishing is a captivating fishing game available as a Chrome Extension. You can play this game for free on the website https://tiny-fishing.org/. In "Tiny Fishing," you'll embark on a delightful fishing adventure where you can test your angling skills. The game is simple yet addictive, suitable for players of all ages. To play, simply click the cast button to throw your fishing line into the water. Move your line around to catch fish and earn money. With the money you earn, you can upgrade your fishing pole, allowing you to catch more fish and explore deeper into the ocean.

*Note: We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://tiny-fishing.org/
